HOME.NO_PARAM: Please enter your physiological data in the parameters.

PARAM.TITLE: Parameters
PARAM.CONFIRM_UPDATE_MESSAGE: There is already a coefficient for this hour ({{coefficient}}). Do you want to update it?
PARAM.DELETE_PARAMETERS_MESSAGE: Initializing the application will remove all your settings.

SENSITIVITY.TITLE: Coefficient calcul
SENSITIVITY.REDUCE: 1 unit of insulin reduce your glucose by how many
SENSITIVITY.BLOOD_GLUCOSE_BETWEEN: The blood glucose value must be between
SENSITIVITY.DESCRIPTION_1: The insulin sensitivity coefficient (also known as K) is a difficult value to evaluate.
SENSITIVITY.DESCRIPTION_2: It includes all the parameters that can modify the action of insulin like the physiology of the patient for example.
SENSITIVITY.DESCRIPTION_3: This coefficient is therefore strongly linked to the person and can not be determined in a common way.
SENSITIVITY.DESCRIPTION_4: There are several ways to estimate it, but these approximations must be verified in use.
SENSITIVITY.SIMPLE_METHOD_DESCRIPTION: The simple method is calculated from the total sum of insulin injected daily, long acting or rapid acting.
SENSITIVITY.COMPLEX_METHOD_DESCRIPTION: The complex method is calculated from the total sum of insulin injected daily as well as the sum of carbohydrates absorbed daily.
SENSITIVITY.REVERSE_METHOD_DESCRIPTION: This method is useful when you already know how much 1 unit of insulin reduces your blood sugar.

ABOUT.TITLE: About
ABOUT.PRESENTATION_TEXT_1: Web developer and diabetic, I developed this application to better control my diabetes.
ABOUT.PRESENTATION_TEXT_2: I hope it will also serve you.
ABOUT.PRESENTATION_TEXT_3: This application does not replace the medical advice of your diabetologist.
ABOUT.PRESENTATION_TEXT_4: If the results are too different from your usual data, do not take it into account. Parameters may be incorrect.
ABOUT.PRESENTATION_TEXT_5: If you have any remarks do not hesitate to contact me.
ABOUT.PRESENTATION_TEXT_6: The application is open source, so you can help me improve, either by reporting bugs, adding translations or by offering new features.

INIT.WELCOME_TEXT: To begin calculating your insulin needs please fill in the information on the following pages.
INIT.WEIGHT_TEXT: Your weight will make it possible to calculate the corrections of blood glucose as well as different coefficients.
INIT.BLOOD_GLUCOSE_UNITS_TEXT: Choose the unit for your blood glucose levels:
